Retrieve Pin

Source: R/pin.R
pin_get.Rd

Retrieves a pin by name from the local or given board.

pin_get(name, board = NULL, cache = TRUE, extract = NULL,
  version = NULL, files = FALSE, signature = NULL, ...)

Arguments

name

The name of the pin.
board

The board where this pin will be retrieved from.
cache

Should the pin cache be used? Defaults to TRUE.
extract

Should compressed files be extracted? Each board defines the default behavior.
version

The version of the dataset to retrieve, defaults to latest one.
files

Should only the file names be returned?
signature

Optional signature to validate this pin, use pin_info() to compute signature.
...

Additional parameters.

Details

pin_get() retrieves a pin by name and, by default, from the local board. You can use the board parameter to specify which board to retrieve a pin from. If a board is not specified, it will use pin_find() to find the pin across all boards and retrieve the one that matches by name.

Examples


library(pins)

# define local board
board_register_local(cache = tempfile())

# cache the mtcars dataset
pin(mtcars)

# retrieve the mtcars pin
pin_get("mtcars")
#> # A tibble: 32 x 11
#>      mpg   cyl  disp    hp  drat    wt  qsec    vs    am  gear  carb
#>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1  21       6  160    110  3.9   2.62  16.5     0     1     4     4
#>  2  21       6  160    110  3.9   2.88  17.0     0     1     4     4
#>  3  22.8     4  108     93  3.85  2.32  18.6     1     1     4     1
#>  4  21.4     6  258    110  3.08  3.22  19.4     1     0     3     1
#>  5  18.7     8  360    175  3.15  3.44  17.0     0     0     3     2
#>  6  18.1     6  225    105  2.76  3.46  20.2     1     0     3     1
#>  7  14.3     8  360    245  3.21  3.57  15.8     0     0     3     4
#>  8  24.4     4  147.    62  3.69  3.19  20       1     0     4     2
#>  9  22.8     4  141.    95  3.92  3.15  22.9     1     0     4     2
#> 10  19.2     6  168.   123  3.92  3.44  18.3     1     0     4     4
#> # … with 22 more rows

# retrieve mtcars pin from packages board
pin_get("easyalluvial/mtcars2", board = "packages")
#> # A tibble: 32 x 12
#>      mpg cyl    disp    hp  drat    wt  qsec vs    am      gear  carb  ids      
#>    <dbl> <ord> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <fct> <fct>   <ord> <ord> <chr>    
#>  1  21   6      160    110  3.9   2.62  16.5 V     manual  4     4     Mazda RX4
#>  2  21   6      160    110  3.9   2.88  17.0 V     manual  4     4     Mazda RX…
#>  3  22.8 4      108     93  3.85  2.32  18.6 S     manual  4     1     Datsun 7…
#>  4  21.4 6      258    110  3.08  3.22  19.4 S     automa… 3     1     Hornet 4…
#>  5  18.7 8      360    175  3.15  3.44  17.0 V     automa… 3     2     Hornet S…
#>  6  18.1 6      225    105  2.76  3.46  20.2 S     automa… 3     1     Valiant  
#>  7  14.3 8      360    245  3.21  3.57  15.8 V     automa… 3     4     Duster 3…
#>  8  24.4 4      147.    62  3.69  3.19  20   S     automa… 4     2     Merc 240D
#>  9  22.8 4      141.    95  3.92  3.15  22.9 S     automa… 4     2     Merc 230 
#> 10  19.2 6      168.   123  3.92  3.44  18.3 S     automa… 4     4     Merc 280 
#> # … with 22 more rows
